uniol.apt.analysis.persistent

Class PersistentTS

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.persistent.PersistentTS

  • public class PersistentTS
extends java.lang.Object
    Checks whether an LTS for persistance. The system is persistent, if it satisfies the "small diamond property". TODO: explain SDP 
     
           a
 (s0) ------------> (s1)
   |                  |
   |                  |
   | b                | b
   |                  |
   V       a          V
 (s2) ------------> (s4)
    Above: Mini-example of an persistent LTS
    Author:
    Vincent GÃ¶bel, Uli Schlachter
